sentences.en: Does this mean that all GM foods are fated never to solve the undernutrition of the poor?
sentences.cn: 这是否意味着所有的转基因食品注定永远不会解决穷人的营养不足？

sentences.en: Malnutrition includes undernutrition, in which nutrients are undersupplied, and overnutrition, in which nutrients are oversupplied.
sentences.cn: 营养不良包括营养低下, 即营养素供给不足, 和营养过剩, 即营养素供给过度.
